attributes.action: Change regulations for large monetary donations to uk political parties
attributes.additional_details: It is unacceptable that any uk political party should have massively inflated donations which could lead to an imbalance in political influence and functioning. Additionally, for this to originate from foreign sources could greatly affect uk stability, democracy, wealth and security in the world.
attributes.background:
Disallow donations to any uk political party from any person or organisation which does not have close, strong and current uk citizenship/business origins.
Limit total annual donation amounts to any uk political party to a reasonable amount to be agreed by all parties.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Tighten the rules on political donations: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707189
